p:
The SHG measurement was investigated via the Kurtz–Perry method.
49 The 1064 nm irradiation was produced via a Q-switched Nd: YAG laser. The sample was ground and sieved into distinct particle size ranges, <38–55, 55–88, 88–105, 105–150, and 150–200 μm. For comparisons, the sieved KDP samples were categorized into the same particle size ranges.
